entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a werewolf who received the bite at a young age and has been taking the Wolfsbane Potion to control his transformations.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a professor who has been making the Wolfsbane Potion for Lupin.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who tries to interrupt Lupin.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who tells Ron to be quiet and watches Lupin intently.

relationships.description: Snape makes the Wolfsbane Potion for Lupin.
Hermione tells Ron to be quiet.
Lupin transforms into a monster during the full moon before taking the Wolfsbane Potion.
Snape provides the Wolfsbane Potion to Lupin.
